items.title: Passenger arrested after allegedly trying to open exit door on SkyWest flight
items.description: A SkyWest flight landed in Cedar Rapids, Michigan, on Thursday evening due to an unruly passenger, according to authorities.

items.title: In win for Trump, House approves $9B in spending cuts -- including USAID cuts
items.description: Murkowski said on Wednesday that she still opposes the bill after voting on Tuesday against advancing it forward.

items.title: Democrats press Trump administration on US deal with El Salvador to detain migrants
items.description: The letter calls on officials to turn over any agreements between the U.S. and El Salvador regarding the detaining of migrants at the notorious CECOT ...

items.title: WATCH:  AG Pam Bondi visits Alcatraz for briefing after Trump's order to reopen prison
items.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi visited Alcatraz on Thursday to assess the viability of reopening the infamous prison.

items.title: WATCH:  Committee advances former Trump attorney for key appeals court role
items.description: Democrats walked out of the Senate Judiciary Committee before Republicans voted to advance Pres. Trump's nomination of Emil Bove.
